I downloaded the game Counter-Strike: Global Offensive recently and decided to play it (out of boredom, so to speak). I must say at first I liked it very much, but after a couple of days I got bored.

The game is very simple. There are two teams of 5 people. You choose a map and play as one of the parties (terrorists or special forces). The game is played up to 16 wins by one of the parties. At the beginning of each game, you can buy the weapon that is the best to play with
